title: Winnie the Pooh
brief_description: 1. Kanga and Roo come to the forest. 2. Pooh invents a new game and Eeyore joins in. 3. Rabbit has a busy day, and we learn what Christopher Robin does in the morning. 4. Christopher Robin and Pooh come to an enchanted place, and we leave them there.
